query:
UPDATE toolComparisons 
SET 
  comparisonData = '{
    "tools": [
      {
        "name": "ChatGPT",
        "provider": "OpenAI",
        "rating": 4.8,
        "pricing": "Free tier, Plus $20/month, Team $25/user/month, Enterprise custom",
        "contextWindow": "128K tokens (GPT-4 Turbo), 200K tokens (GPT-4o)",
        "strengths": ["Most popular", "Large plugin ecosystem", "Advanced Voice Mode", "Canvas for writing/coding", "DALL-E 3 integration", "Web browsing", "Code interpreter"],
        "weaknesses": ["Can be verbose", "Occasional hallucinations", "Rate limits on free tier"],
        "bestFor": "General purpose, creative writing, coding, image generation"
      },
      {
        "name": "Claude",
        "provider": "Anthropic",
        "rating": 4.9,
        "pricing": "Free tier, Pro $20/month, Team $25/user/month, Enterprise custom",
        "contextWindow": "200K tokens (Claude 3.5 Sonnet)",
        "strengths": ["Excellent reasoning", "Very accurate", "Artifacts for interactive content", "Projects for context", "Strong coding abilities", "Ethical AI focus", "Less likely to hallucinate"],
        "weaknesses": ["Slower response times", "No image generation", "Smaller ecosystem"],
        "bestFor": "Complex analysis, coding, research, business documents, ethical AI use"
      },
      {
        "name": "Gemini",
        "provider": "Google",
        "rating": 4.7,
        "pricing": "Free tier, Advanced $20/month (in Google One AI Premium), Enterprise custom",
        "contextWindow": "1M+ tokens (Gemini 1.5 Pro), 2M tokens (experimental)",
        "strengths": ["Largest context window", "Deep Research mode", "Google Workspace integration", "Multimodal (text, image, video, audio)", "Real-time web access", "Gems (custom assistants)", "Free tier very generous"],
        "weaknesses": ["Sometimes less creative", "Newer ecosystem", "Can be overly cautious"],
        "bestFor": "Long document analysis, research, Google Workspace users, multimodal tasks"
      }
    ],
    "featureMatrix": {
      "Context Window": {"ChatGPT": "200K", "Claude": "200K", "Gemini": "1M+"},
      "Image Generation": {"ChatGPT": "✓ (DALL-E 3)", "Claude": "✗", "Gemini": "✓ (Imagen)"},
      "Web Browsing": {"ChatGPT": "✓", "Claude": "✗", "Gemini": "✓"},
      "Voice Mode": {"ChatGPT": "✓ Advanced", "Claude": "✗", "Gemini": "✓ Basic"},
      "Code Execution": {"ChatGPT": "✓", "Claude": "✓", "Gemini": "✓"},
      "File Upload": {"ChatGPT": "✓", "Claude": "✓", "Gemini": "✓"},
      "Custom Instructions": {"ChatGPT": "✓", "Claude": "✓ (Projects)", "Gemini": "✓ (Gems)"},
      "Mobile App": {"ChatGPT": "✓", "Claude": "✓", "Gemini": "✓"},
      "API Access": {"ChatGPT": "✓", "Claude": "✓", "Gemini": "✓"}
    }
  }',
  updatedAt = NOW()
WHERE title = 'ChatGPT vs Claude vs Gemini';
command:
